What is the recommended way of adding a registry in gh actions ci?
I tried using
```- run: |
          julia -e '
            using Pkg
            Pkg.Registry.add(RegistrySpec(url="<https://github.com/ctp-fpub/JuliaRegistry>"))'```
but this fails on windows due to quoting I presume.

text:
you can tell it to use bash on all systems:

```- run: |
    ...
  shell: bash```
That should get around quoting issues.

Or alternatively
```- run: |
    using Pkg
    ...
  shell: julia --color=yes --project=. {0}```
which will copy the value of the `run` block to a temp file and evaluate it using Julia, so you can write Julia code in the run block directly
